about: Bright Future School has been shaping young minds since 1992. Located in the commercial hub of Blantyre, we offer comprehensive education from primary to secondary level with a focus on academic excellence and character development.

admissionInfo.requirements: Birth certificate, Previous academic records, Health certificate, 2 passport photos
admissionInfo.process: Submit application online or visit school, Pay registration fee MK 8,000, Take entrance examination, Interview with parents

news.title: Digital Learning Initiative
news.content: We have launched our digital learning platform with tablets for all students. This will enhance interactive learning and prepare students for the digital age.

news.title: Mathematics Competition Winners
news.content: Our students won first place in the Southern Region Mathematics Competition. Congratulations to the mathematics department and participating students!

news.title: New Dormitory Complex
news.content: Construction of our new dormitory complex is now complete, providing comfortable accommodation for 200 additional students.

announcements.title: School Fees Payment Deadline
announcements.content: All school fees for Term 1 must be paid by January 30th. Late payments will incur a penalty of MK 5,000.

announcements.title: Cultural Day Celebration
announcements.content: Annual cultural day will be celebrated on February 15th. Students should prepare traditional performances and attire.

announcements.title: Vaccination Drive
announcements.content: Free vaccination program for all students will be conducted on January 28th in partnership with Blantyre Health Office.
